code: @Test public void testResetProducer() throws Exception {     String out = template.requestBodyAndHeader("direct:start", null, "id", 123, String.class).     assertEquals("123.Donald Duck", out).     // restart foo     context.getRouteController().stopRoute("foo").     context.getRouteController().startRoute("foo").     out = template.requestBodyAndHeader("direct:start", null, "id", 456, String.class).     assertEquals("456.Donald Duck", out). }

@Test public void testResetConsumer() throws Exception {     String out = template.requestBodyAndHeader("direct:start", null, "id", 123, String.class).     assertEquals("123.Donald Duck", out).     // restart bar     context.getRouteController().stopRoute("bar").     context.getRouteController().startRoute("bar").     out = template.requestBodyAndHeader("direct:start", null, "id", 456, String.class).     assertEquals("456.Donald Duck", out). }
public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     String id = exchange.getIn().getHeader("id", String.class).     exchange.getOut().setBody(id + ".Donald Duck"). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").routeId("foo").to("restlet:http://localhost:" + portNum + "/users/{id}/basic").to("log:reply").     from("restlet:http://localhost:" + portNum + "/users/{id}/basic").routeId("bar").process(new Processor() {          public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {             String id = exchange.getIn().getHeader("id", String.class).             exchange.getOut().setBody(id + ".Donald Duck").         }     }). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").routeId("foo").to("restlet:http://localhost:" + portNum + "/users/{id}/basic").to("log:reply").             from("restlet:http://localhost:" + portNum + "/users/{id}/basic").routeId("bar").process(new Processor() {                  public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {                     String id = exchange.getIn().getHeader("id", String.class).                     exchange.getOut().setBody(id + ".Donald Duck").                 }             }).         }     }. }
